items.sentence: How many times a month do you go to the movies?
I have the feeling that I\'ve been here before.
Tom asked Mary to stop asking stupid questions.
Tom asked Mary where she usually went shopping.
Tom asked Mary why she was buying so much food.
Tom asked for my permission to use my computer.
Tom says people in Boston are terrible drivers.
Tom tried to leave, but Mary wouldn\'t let him.
These are decisions I want you to help me make.
Tom couldn\'t forget Mary even if he wanted to.
I\'ll always remember the first time I saw Tom.
I\'ll be back in an hour to check on you again.
I\'ll be helping Tom with his homework tonight.
What would Tom do if he ever learned the truth?
Tom hasn\'t yet done what he promised he\'d do.
Do you think it\'ll be easy for you to do that?
Do you think it\'ll be hard for you to do that?
Do you think we\'ll ever find a way to do that?
Do you think we\'ll get to the station in time?
Tom hasn\'t yet promised me that he\'d do that.
